title: Context trimming fires 28 times — all players hit 122-message limit repeatedly
description:
All players hit the 122-message context limit repeatedly, triggering 28 total context trims across the game. This means models are losing important game history and earlier strategic context.

Evidence from game_20260209_184021: 28 context trim events. Every player hit the limit multiple times, suggesting the message budget is too tight or messages are too verbose.

Possible fixes:
- Reduce verbosity of game state updates to fit more turns in context
- Increase the message limit if model context windows allow it
- Implement smarter trimming that preserves key game events (spells cast, combat results) while dropping routine passes
- Compress older game state into a summary message instead of keeping individual messages
